title: Manual measure
subtitle: Depending on the device you are setting up, please select the device below and follow the manual.

jyoupro.title: Turn on the mode to measure your heart rate.
steps: From the watch display screen of your JYouPro device, tap the button at the bottom four times. (1)
When the training screen appears, press and hold for a few seconds.(2)
Tapping the button several times will bring up the following screen of four modes.(4)
Press and hold a favorite mode for 2 or 3 seconds, and after 3 counts are displayed,(5)
The mode for measuring the heart rate will change to on. (6) You can participate in a heart rate contest now.

jyoupro.title: To turn off the heart rate measurement mode.
steps: To turn off, press and hold screen (1) for 2 or 3 seconds, and after 3 counts are displayed, the heart rate measurement mode is turned off.

vitalgain_band.title: Turn on the mode to measure your heart rate.
steps: From the Vitalgain band device's clock display screen, tap the screen twice. (1)
Slide once from the top of the screen to the bottom of the shining screen with your finger. (2)
Tap the yellow icon on the top of the training screen to display the training screen. (3)
Tapping several times from the top to the bottom of the yellow marked screen will bring up the following screen with a heart symbol on it. (5)

Once tapped, the heart icon will turn all pink and the device will vibrate, the mode to measure heart rate will change to on. (6)
You can participate in a heart rate contest now.
vitalgain_band.subtitle: Note: Please note that the Vitalgain band measures once every 5 minutes.

vitalgain_band.title: Turn off the mode for measuring heart rate.
steps: To turn off, tap (1) once on the screen.
Heart rate measurement mode is turned off. (2)
